ygData.subject: RE: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Read my signature below :). ... For many of us, the game isn t about STUFF, but apparently it is for you.  Lvl 20 is around the level where current eq
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999 John.Curry@... wrote:

> From: John.Curry@...
>
> Giving away banded.. doph.. the poor blacksmiths who spent all that time
> learning the craft so they could be undersold by someone giveing it away.
Read my signature below :).

> would think that the game STARTs at level 20 :) Thats when you started
> getting stuff for yourself :) Anyway, I really think that if Verant wanted
For many of us, the game isn't about STUFF, but apparently it is
for you. Lvl 20 is around the level where current eq players are bridging
the gap between auction for a random group of similar level people, and
having a small group of friends they regularly group with. That was my
point.

Miriana Windryder
Master Smith
